column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Why do you think you were chosen for this position , and what do you think you can contribute ?
#Text=One of reasons was both my long-term presence in site operations and communicating about our work , spreading our ideology , providing opinions .
#Text=I try to be able to explain difficult topics in human language , and that is quite well appreciated .
#Text=Additionally , I was being a bit of outsider - more of a reader than writer , so I feel that my views are slightly less community centric , more of value centric .

#Text=My experience in a technology team is quite similar to what I expect to see in the board - wide array of issues to work on , and maintaining consensus is incredibly important to keep the productivity high .
#Text=So even though I have deep roots in the project , I feel that I can bring in lots of fresh ways to the board .
#Text=Of course , I will try to provide best possible technology advise , if the board needs it .
#Text=Will you continue doing your previous technical work at the same time ?
#Text=If you do , how will you find a balance ?
#Text=I would really avoid to do all previous work - but it is not needed any more .
#Text=Years ago we were monitoring the site 24/7 , shortage of resources was causing all sorts of difficult problems .
#Text=Now everything is way more steady and reliable , so I have way much more free time .
#Text=I used to do lots of other activities too , so I think I can scale my time just fine .
#Text=And still , of course , I 'll provide as much work to technical part as needed , it just is n't as demanding as it used to be , and we 're really happy about that .
#Text=What major actions do you expect to come your way during your term in office ?

#Text=Though my term is quite short for now ( until June elections ) , the biggest work will be done in understanding how the foundation should function to establish a really long-term presence , to support the projects far into the future .
#Text=It may need changes in how we get external experience , how we interact with other organizations , how we do interact with office staff and each other .
#Text=Foundation did lots of work to get to stable and reliable state , now it is time to think more about the future sustainability and expansion .

#Text=I have operations experience , so of course I will want to maintain high efficiency of overall operation , but on the other hand I want to work on scaling other parts of the foundation - especially reach out , evangelism , and of course - fundraising .
#Text=Do you expect any major upgrades to be needed to hardware or software anytime soon , and if so what ?
